===The Sitemap system===
===The Sitemap system===
â
[[Google Sitemap]] is an experiment in web crawling. Using Sitemaps to inform and direct their crawlers Google hope to expand their coverage of the web and improve the time to inclusion in their index. By placing a Sitemap-formatted file on a webserver, a ste owner enables Google's crawlers to find out what pages are present and which have recently changed, and to crawl the site accordingly.
+
[[Google Sitemap]] is an experiment in web crawling. Using Sitemaps to inform and direct their crawlers Google hope to expand their coverage of the web and improve the time to inclusion in their index. By placing a Sitemap-formatted file on a webserver, a site owner enables Google's crawlers to find out what pages are present and which have recently changed, and to crawl the site accordingly.
==Google and Wikimedia==
==Google and Wikimedia==
